comments.body: New param in 0.7.8 is `packagesPath` (String path to .packages file)
We put spaces inside the `{` and `}` because we're unique snowflakes.
And in my case, apparently illiterate! Missed this comment; will send a quick patch :)
this one's probably fine, assuming collect is defined to return a string->dynamic map.

It is. I've also updated the coverage package to make it explicit that the map returned is a Map<String, dynamic>
